languages.text: "Конечно, побеседуйте еще. Так у вас будут все шансы скоропостижно... договориться".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, побеседуйте еще. Так у вас будут все шансы скоропостижно... договориться".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, побеседуйте еще. Так у вас будут все шансы скоропостижно... договориться".

traits.locale_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances to meet an early... agreement."
"By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances to meet an early... agreement."
"By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

"By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

languages.text: "Gut, sprecht ruhig weiter. Das wird Eure Chancen erhöhen, eine frühe ... Einigung zu finden."
languages.original_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

traits.locale_text: "Gut, sprecht ruhig weiter. Das wird Eure Chancen erhöhen, eine frühe ... Einigung zu finden."

languages.text: « Allez-y, conversez, conversez. Cela ne fera qu'augmenter vos chances de trouver un accord de manière... expéditive. »
languages.original_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

traits.locale_text: « Allez-y, conversez, conversez. Cela ne fera qu'augmenter vos chances de trouver un accord de manière... expéditive. »

languages.text: “不管怎么说，你们还是谈谈吧。这会让你们更有可能……提前达成协议。”
languages.original_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

traits.locale_text: “不管怎么说，你们还是谈谈吧。这会让你们更有可能……提前达成协议。”

languages.text: «Adelante, sigue hablando. Eso hará más fácil que acabemos con... un acuerdo rápido».
languages.original_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

traits.locale_text: «Adelante, sigue hablando. Eso hará más fácil que acabemos con... un acuerdo rápido».

languages.text: 「存分に話すがいい。それがむしろ、早期の…合意に達する可能性を高めることになるからな」
languages.original_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

traits.locale_text: 「存分に話すがいい。それがむしろ、早期の…合意に達する可能性を高めることになるからな」

languages.text: "Tabii, siz sohbet edin. Bu sadece erken bir anlaşmaya varma şansınızı artırır."
languages.original_text: "By all means, converse away. That will only increase your chances of meeting an early... agreement."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii, siz sohbet edin. Bu sadece erken bir anlaşmaya varma şansınızı artırır."
